short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows abstract of cited papers on arXiv when hovering over citation links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Aim is to make your paper reading experience better. For now we only open a small window with the abstract when you hover over a citation. It only works on arxiv html papers, not on pdfs for now
